comments.comment: Awasara haamuduruwaney apita ratabeeyraganna obakatana seywayata obata pin awageyma singhla yana ceylon kiyana apeyratata akama niiteyak hamajatiyama akawagey pasalakawagey hamootama punchikaaley edan palliya pancala kooviley a aagam haredey hareyata kiyadenna oona pasalwal daruwanta barebara vesayaayn adukara ratey nispadanaya atekaranna udukara a ayath padeyak labadee aurudu 25wada wadekaalayak api itarata sulupadeyata wadakaley natnam lamsith kannat igenagannat naha meynisa apitah maaseka watupak labadee madaperadega nawatha ratey wawanadey ratata tika kaleyta hoo kanna bonnadenna iyawarakganna hadawaten vidawamin meygatakarana jiivetey kaaika maanasekawa vidina dukin apiwa beeraganna obata deergaawusaa jaduphitai
comments.author: Vijay  Kumar

comments.comment: SammaSamBudu saranai our Reverands!!!. Your Loving kindness, Determination, lawfulness, for our country and nation is our winnings...our  Srilankan Buddhist heros are for corner's thousands of God's...we appreciate these .. even we live in USA,we love your Determination lawfulness, powerful preaching to the world... Never give chance to religion extreemers, cunning selfish, Money sucking, uneducated selfish brainless meatballs, killing muslims or politicians... Our country politicians are greedy for money and power only...but you all Buddhist Monks always protect the nation....our Sinhalese Buddhist people and Christian people must get together and help for our Reverand's program...so we hope overseas Srilankan will help a lot too... please ask , request from all Srilankan who living in overseas.... May the Triple Jemes Blessed our Buddhist Hero,Lord Buddha's Son and all the helpers... !!!
comments.author: Nobert Jvp

comments.comment: Halal Sahathika epa.  Wenama Muslim Bank  epa. Siyallantama eka neethiyak eka Adikaranayak thibiya yuthui. Bahu wiwahayan ba. Sama jathiyakatama Upath palana Neethiyak gena A yuthui. Adu wayasin Wiwahayan Nokirimata Neethi sadiya yutui. Wenama pasal Ba. Shariya Neethi Madrasa pasal waha nawath wiya yuthui. Anthawadaya ha Wahab wadaya waha nawath wiya yuthui. Sama jathiyakatama eka neethiyak thibiya yuthui. Sama jathiyakatama Samadanayen jeewath weema ta salas wi ya yuthui. Eka Ratak ha eka jathiyak washa yen jeewath weemata puluwan ratak nirmanaya kala yuthui. Siyaluma paksha beda  jathi beda, nathi nayakain ekathu kara gatha yuthui. Kisima desapalkayekuta kade ya Noyutui. Siyaluma sinhalayan ha wenath jathinta pili gatha haki Anduwak nirmanaya kala yutui. Siyaluma Bikshunwansela anit Agamika Nayakawarun Pujeya paksha ekathu kara gatha yutui. Sinhalain norawatwiya yutui.  Esenam Api Oba wahansela samaga ekathu we Ape Ratath Buddagamath bera ganimu. Me Comments Hamuduruwanta balimata ida salassanda.  Budu saranai.
Naganandata  udaw karana nil epa kola epa ehemanam api oba vahansay samagai
comments.author: Ajantha Dediyagala

comments.comment:
Munma thamai yahapalaneta kade giye...

Pahu giya kalema desapalanikawa bankoloth wela nannaththara wela hitiye....

Saharanta pinsidda wenna boru upawasayak kara lakunu dagena porak wenna.....

Habai mun passe yana untath abasarani....

Meyage mula idanma keruwawa hoyala balannako..

Dan kathawa meya lankawata aluthen awa wage..
Habai mechcharakal kare parliment eke andu paksheta wela janathawage badu mudal walin sepa gattha eka..

Ganasara hamuduruwo thamai hari ho waradi me prshnedi kalayak hitan hitiye..
Mu kohenda eka patatama path une???????
